overview: After a break-in at their house, a couple gets help from one of the cops who answered their call. He helps them install a security system, begins dropping by on short notice and unofficial patrol angling to pry into the couple's problems with the wife. The husband begins wondering if they're getting too much help.
tagline: Desire, passion, lust... It's a deadly game of obsession.
cast: Kurt Russell|Ray Liotta|Madeleine Stowe|Roger E. Mosley|Ken Lerner
